Dialogs.Text: Thomas B: (Maki asked me to help with fixing a broken image in the chat.)
Thomas B: (Not only that, she was doing so on behalf of the group. I haven't met them yet, but that tells me that they aren't just exploring...)
Thomas B: (They are looking to restore what they can of this place... Which means, they are quite protective of this place.)
Thomas B: (I need to be ready for any questions they are going to lay on me when i meet them.)
